metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27534 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: util/binfmt_misc/check.go in Builder in Docker Engine before 19.03.9 calls os.OpenFile with a potentially unsafe qemu-check temporary pathname, constructed with an empty first argument in an ioutil.TempDir call.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> the patch looks like a windows-specific issue, the description is "Avoid creation of irrelevant temporary files on Windows." and it basically only modified Windows code. Marking as not-affected.

criterions.comment: docker.io: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
